alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued December 12 at 1:08PM PST until December 12 at 8:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST THIS EVENING FOR PYRAMID LAKE... * CHANGES...Extended duration of advisory to until 8 PM. * WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts of 30 to 35 mph. Waves 2 to 3 feet. Waves to 4 feet around Anaho Island. * WHERE...Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
